items.name: dropzone
items.title: Dropzone
items.description: A flexible file dropzone component with drag-and-drop support, file validation, and context integration.

items.name: errors
items.title: Errors
items.description: Error handler component that displays errors as toast notifications using sonner.

items.name: header
items.title: Header
items.description: A header component for file upload UI with file count and actions.

items.name: list
items.title: List
items.description: A list-based file display component showing upload status, progress, and error handling.

items.name: upload
items.title: Upload
items.description: A complete file upload component with dropzone, progress tracking, and error handling. Includes all upload components in one ready-to-use block.
